name: Deep Cut (Louis Vogel, Mycotium, Jules_Gibert, peastfear, Math_EK, Kermisto, Xdrive80, Narga, Tyranie)
name_original: Deep Cut (Louis Vogel, Mycotium, Jules_Gibert, peastfear, Math_EK, Kermisto, Xdrive80, Narga, Tyranie)
description:
Get high, crash into the party and bash in the skulls !

ActionKeyboardControllerMoveWASDLeft Joystick
Turn Around
Mouse
Right Joystick
AttackLeft Click
Right Bumper
Throw WeaponRight Click
Left Bumper
Look furtherShift + Mouse
Right Trigger
Quick RestartRSelect

Since you are pretty high, you can't really tell the difference between a fish and a katana. Weapons frequently change appearance, but their effect remains the same.

This game was made in 3 days for a school project.

Enjoy, and please leave a feedback ! Or don't. It's a free Internet.
